LanguageData.PES_TryContact_CoolDown: We can only broadcast messages to a certain object once per hour. Remaining Time: {0}
LanguageData.PES_TryContactPrologue_Unknown:
Since we have not established communication with "{0}", we can try to broadcast a message from this comms console, hoping they receive this message and reply to us. 

But beware, we don't know if they are our allies or enemies.
LanguageData.PES_TryContactPrologue_Neutral:
Although the colony's reconnaissance system has identified {0} is friendly, we still cannot establish communication with them. 

We can broadcast a message, urging them to reply to us ASAP.
LanguageData.PES_TryContactPrologue_Hostile:
Caution: {0} has been recognized by the colony's reconnaissance system as an incoming menace, but we haven't uncovered all of their information. 

We can try to broadcast a message demanding them to state their intention or try to force them leave.
LanguageData.PES_BroadCastMessage: So, {0} decide to send a message saying that:
LanguageData.PES_BroadCastMessage_Mechanoid: Since we've already know they are mechanoids, we can only:
LanguageData.PES_TryContactPrologue_Mechanoid: Initiate greeting protocol with those soulless machines\n
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Persuasion_Unknown: "This is {0} from {1} speaking. Please state your intentions and confirm that you have no hostility towards us."
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Persuasion_Neutral: "This is {0} from {1} speaking. We have confirmed that you are not hostile to our colony. Please contact us ASAP!"
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Persuasion_Hostile: "This is {0} from {1} speaking. Our reconnaissance system has identified your hostile activity. Name your intentions!"
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Intimidation_have_mortar: "We've confirmed your location. State your intention immediately or be prepared for a rain of mortar fire!"
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Intimidation_no_mortar: "We've confirmed your location. State your intention immediately or our commandos will launch an immediate assault!"
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Beguilement: "This is an SOS message from {0} of {1}: we are currently under heveay attack by mechanoids; countless centipedes, lancers and scythers are flocking into our base! We need immediate military assistance! Right Now! Ahhhhhhhhhh"
LanguageData.PES_TryContact_Beguilement_FactionConfir: "This is {0} from {1} speaking. {1} is currently occupying {2}. Any incoming corps with unidentifiable intention will be recognized as a threat to {1}"
LanguageData.PES_Contact_Fail: {0} received nothing from the comms console. We don't know if they failed to receive this message at all, or they just chose to keep silent.
LanguageData.PES_Persuasion_Success_Hostile: We received a reply from them! They are from {0}! We now know their intention and raiding goals. \n\nCommunication Established.
LanguageData.PES_Persuation_Success_Friendly: We received a reply from them! They are from {0}! We now know all information about them.\n\nCommunication Established.
LanguageData.PES_Intimidation_SuccessFlee_Hostile: Our intimidation worked! Our reconnaissance system found that {0} are now fleeing in panic, and we identified them as people from {1}. It seems that we have won a battle without bloodshed.
LanguageData.PES_Intimidation_SuccessFlee_Friendly: Our intimidation worked! Our reconnaissance system found that {0} are now fleeing in panic, but we also identified them as actually people from {1}. It seems that our previous message was so scary that we frightened off our friends...
LanguageData.PES_Beguilement_SuccessFlee_Hostile: Our deceptive message worked! We managed to make them believe we are now under attack from mechanoids. Our reconnaissance system found that {0} are now fleeing in panic, and we identified them as people from {1}. It seems that we have won a battle without bloodshed.
LanguageData.PES_Beguilement_SuccessFlee_Friendly: Our deceptive message worked! We managed to make them believe we are now under attack from mechanoids. Our reconnaissance system found that {0} are now fleeing in panic, but we also identified them as actually people from {1}. It seems that our previous message was so scary that we frightened off our friends...
LanguageData.PES_Beguilement_SuccessLeave_Hostile: Our deceptive message worked! We managed to make them believe this place is taken by people from their own faction. Our reconnaissance system found that {0} are now retreating. It seems that we have won a battle without bloodshed.
LanguageData.PES_Mechanoid_Outcome_1: They replied us! But... the message they sent to us... contains only seven words...
LanguageData.PES_Mechanoid_Outcome_2: They replied us! But... the message they sent to us... was only repeating one word...
